featured.text: One research report shows men and women use much the same grammar and vocabulary in English, although each sex uses certain kinds of words and structures more frequently than the other.

definition.zh_def: 語法：語言中用於組織單詞和短語的規則和結構。
definition.en_def: Grammar: The set of rules and structures used to organize words and phrases in a language.
definition.example: Understanding grammar is essential for writing clearly.
